1 Week Left to Complete Your Mid-Year Check-In! 

The countdown is on; only one week remains! Take this final opportunity to revisit your 2025 goals, check your progress, and make those last updates or adjustments. 

Reminder: All goals will be locked on August 31st, and no further edits will be possible after this date. 

Align with your manager now to ensure you close the mid-year on track and ready for success.  

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-2-min.png> 	

Welcoming Marine Hutin

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1873&user=10620>

chunks.text:
Align with your manager now to ensure you close the mid-year on track and ready for success.  

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/01-2-min.png> 	

Welcoming Marine Hutin

 <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1873&user=10620> 	

Marine Hutin joins our Group as General Manager at Zimmermann Middle East.​
Marine brings a wealth of experience in retail, having spent the past 15 years overseeing the GCC markets. She relocated from Germany to Dubai in 2010 with Richemont, where she held key roles including Marketing Manager and Regional Retail Director for Montblanc. In 2019, she continued her journey in luxury retail by joining Prada as Retail Director.​

Read More​ <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1873&user=10620> 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/02-7-min.png> 	

The Deal Staff Sale

Enjoy up to to 90% OFF on top designer brands, open to family and friends! 

Location: D3, Building 9 – R06

Dates & Timings:
August 26 – 27: 10:00 AM – 8:00 PM
August 28 – 29: 10:00 AM – 6:00 PM

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/0c3de10c503a04210347f14666d7cbd6565035869.jpg> 	
 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/newsletter/numbers/03-1-min.png> 	

Maison Margiela | Exclusive Friends & Family Sale 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a11bb61bb60bfcce165ccbe2894e98aa790374607.jpg>

Maison Margiela | Exclusive Friends & Family Sale 

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/a11bb61bb60bfcce165ccbe2894e98aa790374607.jpg> 	

Last chance to enjoy special access on selected lines at Maison Margiela, Dubai Mall and Mall of the Emirates. 
This offer is available exclusively for Chalhoub Group employees (Employee ID or One Chalhoub profile required) and is valid until August 31st. 

Shop now : MOE <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1874&user=10620>  | Dubai Mall  <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1875&user=10620>  

For inquiries and to share your news in the Internal News please contact rasha.nashashibi@chalhoub.com <https://onechalhoub.connexionsnow.com/mtracking/linkref.php?link1id=1876&user=10620>
